item.title: SQLAlchemy
item.description: What is ORM? ORM = Object Relational Database. SQLAlchemy is connecting Python classes to tables on relational database. Remember to load data into database with bulk operations Further reading Pandas and SQLAlchemy different implementations of marriage between Pandas and SQLAlchemy Why ORM is slow?
